## SolidLineMaterial.dashColor property

Dash color.

 The property \[\[gapSize\]\] need to be set to enable dashed line.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get dashColor(): THREE.Color;

set dashColor(value: THREE.Color);
```
